flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Directly from Tibet, hand crafted by artisans using various materials to make Tibetan jewelry，Tibetan Art，Sterling Silver Bracelet，sterling silver ring，Sterling Silver Necklace，Sterling Silver Amulet，Tibetan Silver Bracelet，Tibetan necklaces/necklace，Tibetan pendants/pendants，Tibetan Earrings/earrings，Tibetan Rings/rings，Tibetan Bracelet/bracelet，Tibetan Turquoise，jewelry box，Horn Combs，India Mirror，Kukri Knives，Tibetan Prayer Wheel，Wrist Chains

. The jewelry are made from sterling silver and accent the various beautiful materials they surround.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Directly from Tibet, hand crafted by artisans using various materials to make Tibetan jewelry，Tibetan Art，Sterling Silver Bracelet，sterling silver ring，Sterling Silver Necklace，Sterling Silver Amulet，Tibetan Silver Bracelet，Tibetan necklaces/necklace，Tibetan pendants/pendants，Tibetan Earrings/earrings，Tibetan Rings/rings，Tibetan Bracelet/bracelet，Tibetan Turquoise，jewelry box，Horn Combs，India Mirror，Kukri Knives，Tibetan Prayer Wheel，Wrist Chains

. The jewelry are made from sterling silver and accent the various beautiful materials they surround.
guide.summary: Tibetan ornaments also convey a culture. Many of the Tibetan silver bracelets are carved with the six-syllable mantra ("Om Mani Padme Hum"), which in Tibetan Buddhism is believed to have the ability to eliminate disease, fear of death, prolong life and in
guide.title: Tibetan jewelry
